Blackjack

Class Hand

  • java.lang.Object
    • Blackjack.Hand

  • public class Hand
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that simulates a player's hand of cards during a card game.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static Deck deck
      Shuffled deck which all hands draw from.
      private static int deckPos
      Current position to draw from in the deck.
      private java.lang.String[] hand
      Array which stores the hand of cards.
      private int size
      How many cards are in the hand.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Hand()
      Default constructor which draws 2 cards (default starting Blackjack hand).
      Hand(int size)
      Constructor that takes a hand size and draws that many cards.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private int cardValue(int index)
      Gets the value of a single card in the hand, aces are always 11, face cards are always 10.
      private java.lang.String draw()
      Draws card and safely increments deckPos.
      int getSize()
      Get the size of the hand.
      void hit()
      Add a single card to the hand.
      int sum()
      Sums up the hand using Blackjack rules for counting.
      java.lang.String toString() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • deckPos

        private static int deckPos
        Current position to draw from in the deck. Increments with each draw.

      • deck

        private static Deck deck
        Shuffled deck which all hands draw from.

      • hand

        private java.lang.String[] hand
        Array which stores the hand of cards.

      • size

        private int size
        How many cards are in the hand.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Hand

        public Hand(int size)
        Constructor that takes a hand size and draws that many cards.
        Parameters:
        size - The size of the hand to start with.
        Throws:
        HandBiggerThanDeckException - When the amount of cards in the hand is bigger than the whole deck,

      • Hand

        public Hand()
        Default constructor which draws 2 cards (default starting Blackjack hand).

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        private java.lang.String draw()
        Draws card and safely increments deckPos.
        Returns:
        The card to be drawn.
        Throws:
        DeckEmptyException - When the deck is empty and cannot draw anymore.

      • cardValue

        private int cardValue(int index)
        Gets the value of a single card in the hand, aces are always 11, face cards are always 10.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of the card in the hand array to get the value of.
        Returns:
        The value of the card.

      • sum

        public int sum()
        Sums up the hand using Blackjack rules for counting.
        Returns:
        The sum of the hand.

      • hit

        public void hit()
        Add a single card to the hand.

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Get the size of the hand.
        Returns:
        How many cards are in the hand.
